snippet.title: Beyond Your Window - Celebration Trailer
snippet.description:
New trailer to celebrate 5000 downloads on itch.io!
Beyond Your Window is a short narrative game divided into 4 different short stories, each with an epilogue that changes depending on the players' choices.

While searching for new stories to tell, you look outside your window...and catch glimpses of other people's lives.

Download here: https://team-soletude.itch.io/beyond-your-window
